content: be 56 x 3tr clusters on each side this round consists of 60 starburst squares these are worked in exactly the same way as the starbursts in the central panel with the exception that the final round will be join as you go this is the technique you used to join the mini grannies to the blanket in round 12 start joining at one corner doesn t matter which and work around the blanket in a clockwise direction all the starbursts in this round are the same size there are no rectangles i used the following colours for each square first letter is centre last letter is the outer joining round 1 b d c e 21 d a e c 41 d a b c 2 c a d b 22 c b a d 42 e d c a 3 a d e c 23 a c d b 43 a b d e 4 d e b a 24 d a c e 44 d c a b 5 e c a d 25 c d b a 45 b a c d 6 d a c b 26 b a e c 46 d b e c 7 b a e c 27 e c d b 47 c e d a 8 c b d e 28 a b c d 48 a d c b 9 e d c a 29 e d a c 49 b c a e 10 c a e b 30 c d b a 50 e a b c 11 b e a c 31 d b c e 51 c b e d 12 e a b d 32 e a d b 52 a e d b 13 a c e b 33 d e a c 53 e d c a 14 b e c a 34 a c b d 54 d c b e 15 d a e c 35 c a e b 55 b e d c 16 c e b d 36 b e d a 56 c a e b 17 a d c e 37 d b c e 57 a b c d 18 d c a b 38 e d a c 58 e c d a 19 b e d a 39 c e d b 59 c d a b 20 c d b e 40 b c e d 60 a c b d © anita gibney 2015/2024 madebyanita co uk all rights reserved please do not copy sell share or otherwise distribute this pattern 21 grace round 27 rsu join colour a between two treble clusters in any starburst do not join yarn where the squares are joined 2ch and then 2tr in same space work 3tr clusters in each space until you reach a point where 2 squares join now work tr2tog in exactly the same way as you did in round 1 across the two squares continue working in this
